20110106030651.000|20110106030653.000|CC1|LOOK AT I.R.S. AGENT, 150

20110106033407.000|20110106033408.000|CC1|TAXES IN AMERICA.               
20110106033408.000|20110106033410.000|CC1|SO IT WAS A REBALANCING OF      
20110106033410.000|20110106033413.000|CC1|TAXES, BUT A HUGE NET REDUCTION.
20110106033413.000|20110106033416.000|CC1|AND I THINK WITH REGARD TO THE  
20110106033416.000|20110106033417.000|CC1|NATIONAL SITUATION, THE WAY

20110106035055.000|20110106035101.000|CC1|FOR A $400,000 PARDON.
